Description: Agreed to pay $3 million in refunds in settlement of allegations it used deceptive marketing to sell its electricity contracts.

Info Source: AG Kane: Third Settlement with Electric Generation Supplier Would Provide 2.4 Million Dollars More in Refunds, Targeted News Service, August 6, 2015 (via Nexis).

Description: The settlement with IDT Energy followed an informal investigation into 21 consumer complaints in connection with marketing incidents with one of the company's independent sales agents.

The Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission approved a settlement under which IDT Energy, Inc. (IDT), an electric generation supplier, agreed to pay more than $6.75 million in consumer refunds and penalties in connection with alleged deceptive actions that triggered thousands of consumer complaints during the Polar Vortex winter of 2013-14.
